name: Paws for a Cause
shortDesc: Support dog shelters and rescue efforts.
longDesc: Paws for a Cause aims to support dog shelters and rescue efforts. Your donation will help provide medical care, food, and shelter for dogs in need of a loving home.

name: Whiskers Rescue Fund
shortDesc: Rescue and care for homeless cats.
longDesc: Whiskers Rescue Fund is dedicated to the rescue and care of homeless cats. Your donation will contribute to veterinary care, spaying/neutering, and finding loving homes for cats in need.

name: Hop to a Happy Home
shortDesc: Support the well-being of rescue rabbits.
longDesc: Hop to a Happy Home focuses on supporting the well-being of rescue rabbits. Your donation will help provide proper housing, medical care, and adoption programs for rabbits in need.

name: Quack Aid
shortDesc: Contribute to the well-being of ducks.
longDesc: Quack Aid aims to contribute to the well-being of ducks. Your donation will support initiatives for duck conservation, habitat preservation, and promoting awareness about these charming waterfowl.

name: Hooves of Hope
shortDesc: Support rescue and rehabilitation of horses.
longDesc: Hooves of Hope focuses on the rescue and rehabilitation of horses. Your donation will contribute to veterinary care, proper nutrition, and finding forever homes for horses in need.
